scripts.packages:cleaninstall: npm run packages:clean && npm run packages:install
scripts.packages:update: npm run packages:clean && ncu -u && npm run packages:install && npm run start:dev
scripts.start: npm run packages:install && NODE_ENV=production pm2 start main.js -i max --node-args='--max-old-space-size=32000' -f && pm2 monit
scripts.restart: pm2 delete all && npm run start
scripts.start:fresh: git pull origin main && npm run packages:install && npm run start:dev
scripts.start:freshcode: git pull origin main && npm run packages:install && npm run start:code
scripts.update:all: npm run packages:clean && git pull origin main && ncu -u && npm run packages:install && npm run start:dev
